OneLineDescription: Swaps NPC faces around based on user defined settings.
LongDescription:
Not ready yet 4/18/24. Mostly intened as a modern update to SkyFem, but can be used to:
Make all NPCs female
Make all NPCs male
Swap NPC genders
Additionally apply specific swaps to be performed, even from mods whose changes are overwritten by other mods
Optionally output a batch CSV file for use in xVASynth. Please read the Readme at https://github.com/FlattGiraffe/NPC-Face-Swapper
